info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lea County through 445 PM MDT... At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of McDonald, or 13 miles northeast of Lovington, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lovington and McDonald. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
